column4: Anyone help me with an Ubuntu install? I have 6.10 normal and alt, 7.04, and I get bizarre, different errors with everything I do
It's a new computer with recent parts so I had to get the newer kernel to support my hardware
Suggestion is that if you don't know how to handle weirdness and specifically kernel weirdness, stick with 6.10 now.
it's possible, but do you need something newer than 2.6.17 for a particular purpose?
